Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Reformation[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]If you've founded a religion, gain a bonus Reformation belief. If you haven't founded a religion and you control the Holy City of your Capital City's Religion, become the Reformation founder of that Religion.

The religious authorities of {1_relicon:textkey} {2_reldesc:textkey} have fallen to ruin and obsolesence. {3_playername:textkey} has initiated a Reformation of {1_relicon:textkey} {2_reldesc:textkey}, and now {3_playername:textkey} alone will benefit from the Founder Beliefs of {1_relicon:textkey} {2_reldesc:textkey}.
